price: Пас, он гоҳ ки як бор дар сур дамида шавад
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ نَفۡخَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri nafkhatun wāḥidatun
